reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 495/06: TRANSITIONAL MATTERS RE: ENACTMENT OF THE CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES STATUTE LAW AMENDMENT ACT, 2006
reg_info.reg_name_text: Transitional Matters re: enactment of the child and family services Statute law amendment act, 2006
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 495/06: TRANSITIONAL MATTERS RE: ENACTMENT OF THE CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES STATUTE LAW AMENDMENT ACT, 2006

content.content:
1. Section 57.2 of the Act does not apply to a proceeding under the Children’s Law Reform Act that is commenced before the day section 15 of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006
is proclaimed in force if the court having jurisdiction over the proceeding has not ordered that the proceeding be stayed before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Section 57.2 of the Act does not apply to a proceeding under the Children’s Law Reform Act that is commenced before the day section 15 of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006 is proclaimed in force if the court having jurisdiction over the proceeding has not ordered that the proceeding be stayed before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 1.

content.content:
2. Subsection 59 (2) of the Act, as it read immediately before the day subsection 17 (2) of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006
is proclaimed in force, continues to apply to proceedings that were initiated under Part III of the Act before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Subsection 59 (2) of the Act, as it read immediately before the day subsection 17 (2) of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006 is proclaimed in force, continues to apply to proceedings that were initiated under Part III of the Act before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 2.

content.content:
3. Section 145 of the Act, as it read immediately before the day section 37 of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006
is proclaimed in force, continues to apply to cases where the Director received notice under subsection 145 (1) or (2) of the Act before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Section 145 of the Act, as it read immediately before the day section 37 of the Child and Family Services Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006 is proclaimed in force, continues to apply to cases where the Director received notice under subsection 145 (1) or (2) of the Act before that day.  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 495/06, s. 4.
